price: Dan sesungguhnya telah Kami perintahkan 948 kepada Adam dahulu, maka ia lupa (akan perintah itu) dan tidak Kami dapati padanya kemauan yang kuat.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ عَهِدۡنَآ إِلَىٰٓ ءَادَمَ مِن قَبۡلُ فَنَسِيَ وَلَمۡ نَجِدۡ لَهُۥ عَزۡمٗا
footnotes: 948.  Perintah Allah Subḥānahu wa Ta‘ālā  ini tersebut dalam ayat 35 Surah (2) Al-Baqarah.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ʿahid'nā ilā ādama min qablu fanasiya walam najid lahu ʿazman
